#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	long long int n,i,j;
	scanf("%lld", &n);
	long long int a[n],b[n];
	for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
		scanf("%lld", &a[i]);
		b[i]=a[i];
	}
	sort(a,a+n);
	for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
		while(a[i]==0 && i < n-1) {
			i++;
		}
		long long int count=0,ans=0;
		for(j=0;j<n;j++) {
			if( b[j] >= a[i]) {
				b[j] = b[j] - a[i];
				ans++;
				//printf("%lld\n", a[i]);
				//if(b[j] > 0) printf("%lld ", b[j]);
				//else printf("0 ");
			}
			//else {
			//	printf("0\n");
			//}
			
		}
		printf("%lld\n", ans);
	  	long long int count1=0;
		for(j=0;j<n;j++) {
			if(j>i) a[j]=a[j]-a[i];
			if(b[j] == 0) count1++;
		}
		if(count1 == n) break;
		a[i]=0;
		//printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
